text:
24/2/2025
Roam around this area, good place for photography. A few washrooms around. Plenty of parking lots available. A few restaurants but too early when I was here.

This place has many small private art galleries. Some modern and avant-garde, others traditional. The art exhibitions will change after a few months so it is worth a revisit from time to time. Admission free. There some restaurants around here, too. A nice place to soak in the artistic atmosphere.

Nice area that's away from the hustle and bustle of Singapore.  There's a few restaurants here, art exhibitions and bikers motorhead workshop/gallery in this place.

Next to Hort Park, the Southern Ridges walk, it's perfect to be part of your walk plans.
Always enjoyed coming here with its various establishments  and activities. Offers a different environment and experience.

Itâ€™s my first time to Gillman Baracks to volunteer for the arts. Gillman Barracks is a very lovely place that is away from the city and surrounded by lush greenery. There are several art galleries to visit. Do give it a try if you love the arts!
